sect1.title: Purpose
sect1.para:
This page intends to be the manual used by the testers to develop tests.
The purpose of this page is to provide the available keywords and all the information related to them.
In order to develop a test, the tester shall use the available keywords on "Available Keywords" tab.
For more information about them, "Class Details" tab shall be consulted.
For more information about how to develop a test see "Validation Tests Definition" tab or the documentation.
